test_source_code:
def test_bytesify() -> None:
    assert bytesify(b"123") == b"123"
    assert bytesify(bytearray(b"123")) == b"123"
    assert bytesify("123") == b"123"

    with pytest.raises(UnicodeEncodeError):
        bytesify("\u1234")

    with pytest.raises(TypeError):
        bytesify(10)
